definition[0]: a company that moves goods or passengers from one place to another
definition[1]: a military vehicle or ship used to move soldiers, weapons etc
definition[2]: someone who passes a disease or gene to other people, especially without being affected by it themselves
example[1]: carriers of the lung disease, TB
definition[5]: a company that provides a service such as insurance or telephones
definition[6]: a person or company whose job is to TRANSPORT goods from one place to another
example[3]: national carriers like Pickfords, with their own warehouses and regular clientele
example[4]: the American overseas air carrier, United Airlines
